alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:42PM EST until January 17 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches expected. A transition to rain is expected through the morning. Winds may gust as high as 45 mph during the morning. * WHERE...Strafford and Eastern Hillsborough Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads will become snow covered and slippery. Intense snowfall rates will make for worse driving conditions than usual, and a switch to rain will make remaining snow covered roads even more slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates are anticipated, with rates of 1 to 3 inches per hour expected at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
